subject: Football
lead_paragraph: N.F.L. owners approved a $200 million loan for the San Francisco 49ers, who hope to break ground soon in Santa Clara, Calif., on a replacement for Candlestick Park.
snippet: N.F.L. owners approved a $200 million loan for the San Francisco 49ers, who hope to break ground soon in Santa Clara, Calif., on a replacement for Candlestick Park.
